TopicTitle: Looking for an airship mod that allows persistent flying

Articles.Content: I know that there are several airship mods, but I was wondering if any of them allowed a flying airship to be persistent after leaving physics range. I don't think that the one I've used before, Hooligan Labs, allowed it.
You just had to land it or get down to around 100 m think it was.

Hooligan labs will be persistent once its slowed down and "landed" (has a part touching ground) so hooligan labs + kerbal attachment system (and kerbal inventory system) will make airships persistent and easy
